New Records: Zaccharie Risacher scored a career-high 33 points and made 6-for-10 on 3-pointers
Key Match Events: Risacher recorded a triple-double with 33 points, 7 rebounds, and 6 three-pointers
Atlanta Hawks ended a three-game home-court losing streak to the Knicks
The game was tied 110-110 with 1:31 remaining
Atlanta took the lead for good on a pair of free throws and a dunk from Clint Capela
New York lost the final two games of its four-game road trip
The Hawks led 36-28 but New York went on a 25-10 run to grab a 53-46 lead with 4:13 remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Trae Young was able to play despite sore right ribs
Karl-Anthony Towns led the Knicks with 34 points, 16 rebounds and three blocks
Jalen Brunson scored 21 points and Miles McBride added 16 points and seven assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zaccharie Risacher made five 3-pointers and scored 22 in the first half
The game was part of the first of four meetings between the teams
